title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.description: Breeding Journey is the Data Controller for all personal data processed within the service.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Dog and breeding records you enter
Usage data to improve our service

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis (GDPR)
legalBasis.description: We process your data based on the following legal grounds:
items: Contract – to provide the Breeding Journey service you signed up for
Consent – when you voluntarily add breeding data, receive emails, or use optional features
Legitimate Interest – for improving security, preventing misuse, and enhancing the user experience
Legal Obligation – when accounting or tax rules require limited data retention

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Provide and maintain the Breeding Journey service
Send important updates about your account
Improve our platform based on usage patterns

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Breeding Journey uses encryption in transit (HTTPS) and at rest to protect your personal data. We never store plain-text passwords – all authentication is handled securely by Supabase using industry-standard hashing. We use role-based access controls to ensure only you can access your breeding records.

dataTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
dataTransfers.description: Some of our service providers (such as Supabase, Stripe, and Resend) may process data outside the EU/EEA. When this happens, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and GDPR-compliant data processing agreements.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your data only for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, all personal and dog-related data is permanently removed. Some payment records may be retained for up to 7 years in accordance with accounting laws.

yourRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We only use essential cookies required for login and secure authentication. We do not use tracking, advertising, or analytics cookies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Breeding Journey is the Data Controller responsible for processing your personal data within the service.
contact.subDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@breedingjourney.com
